name: CMScanner
short_description: A tool, similar to Nikto in many ways, for identifying web applications and their version numbers, running at a target. Unlike Nikto, CMScanner targets content management systems, detecting vulnerabilities and allowing for automatic exploitation.

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: MIT License
